    • Method Detail

      • startClassification

        public void startClassification()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Classifies Tweets into the basic emotions using emotion word lists.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if the word list file can not be read

      • train

        private void train()
        Performs hill climbing to find a local optimum weight matrix. This is done several times and then the average weight matrices are calculated.

      • getSeed

        private double[][] getSeed()
        Fills an array with random startvalues between -1 and 1.
        Returns:
        Returns an array filled with random start values.

      • deepCopy

        private double[][] deepCopy(double[][] weightMatrix)
        Creates an copy of the input matrix.
        Parameters:
        weightMatrix - To be copied matrix.
        Returns:
        Returns copy of the input matrix.

      • varyMatrix

        private void varyMatrix(double[][] matrix)
        Adds a random number from the gaussian distribution to each cell of the input matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - To be varied matrix.

      • calculateSTDEV

        private void calculateSTDEV()
        Calculates the average weighting matrices and their corresponding standard deviations.

      • classifyTweet

        private void classifyTweet(Tweet tweet)
        Calculates the basic emotion for each Tweet.
        Parameters:
        tweet - To be classified Tweet.

      • calculatePredictedEmotion

        private java.lang.String calculatePredictedEmotion(double[] emotionValues)
        Calculates the predicted emotion by searching the highest emotion value
        Parameters:
        emotionValues - Values of each basic emotion
        Returns:
        Returns predicted basic emotion string

      • calculateWeighting

        private double[] calculateWeighting(Token token,
                                    double[] emotionValues,
                                    int emotion)
        Calculates the weighting for a token.
        Parameters:
        token - Token for which the weighting is calculated
        emotionValues - Array that contains a weighting for each emotion.
        emotion - Emotion of the current token.
        Returns:
        Returns weighting for the corresponding token

      • loadWordlist

        private void loadWordlist()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the emotion word list that is used for classification.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if emotion lexicon file is missing/corrupt

      • getBestWeightMatrices

        public double[][][] getBestWeightMatrices()
        Returns:
        Returns the weight matrices which lead to the highest F1 score.

      • getWeightMatricesAVG

        public double[][][] getWeightMatricesAVG()
        Returns:
        Returns the average weight matrices.

      • getWeightMatricesSTDEV

        public double[][][] getWeightMatricesSTDEV()
        Returns:
        Returns the standard deviation for each matrix.
